txt.en: A farm near Langhold has been robbed, and the brigands are too many and too near for your liking.
A farm near Langhold has been robbed, and the brigands are too many and too near for your liking.
Cattle and other stolen goods can be found in the brigand encampment in the northern Wold.\n\nYou should free the cattle and collect the stolen goods from the brigands.

'My... my goods! The cattle wandered back on their own, and I've tucked them away in the barn, and now the lost money and grain? I do not know how to thank you, [placeholder]. Thank goodness you came to Langhold when you did.'
Cattle and other stolen goods can be found in the brigand encampment in the northern Wold.\n\nYou should free the cattle and collect the stolen goods from the brigands.
The farmer is at his farm between Langhold and the brigands' encampment.\n\nYou should return the stolen goods to the farmer, who is much poorer after the robbery by brigands.
Bring the stolen goods back to their rightful owner
